Docs
Tutorial
business (opens new window)

# Initializing a swarm

docker swarm init

# Joining a swarm as a worker

docker swarm join --token :

# Joining a swarm as a manager

docker swarm join-token manager

# Creating a service

docker service create --name

# Updating a service

docker service update --image

# Scaling a service

docker service scale =

# Inspecting a service

docker service inspect

# Listing services

docker service ls

# Removing a service

docker service rm

# Creating a secret

echo "" | docker secret create -

# Listing secrets

docker secret ls

# Inspecting a secret

docker secret inspect

# Removing a secret

docker secret rm

# Creating a configuration

docker config create

# Listing configurations

docker config ls

# Inspecting a configuration

docker config inspect

# Removing a configuration

docker config rm

# Deploying a stack

docker stack deploy --compose-file

# Listing stacks

docker stack ls

# Inspecting a stack

docker stack ps

# Removing a stack

docker stack rm

# Setting node labels

docker node update --label-add =

# Removing node labels

docker node update --label-rm

# Draining a node

docker node update --availability drain

# Bringing a drained node back online

docker node update --availability active

# Promoting a worker node to manager

docker node promote

# Demoting a manager node to worker

docker node demote

# Listing nodes

docker node ls

# Inspecting a node

docker node inspect

# Removing a node

docker node rm

# Creating a network

docker network create

# Listing networks

docker network ls

# Inspecting a network

docker network inspect

# Removing a network

docker network rm

# Creating a volume

docker volume create

# Listing volumes

docker volume ls

# Inspecting a volume

docker volume inspect

# Removing a volume

docker volume rm

# Starting a stack deploy

docker stack deploy

# Listing stacks

docker stack ls

# Listing services in a stack

docker stack services

# Listing tasks in a stack

docker stack ps

# Scaling a service in a stack

docker service scale _=

# Updating a service in a stack

docker service update _ --image

# Removing a stack

docker stack rm

# Creating an overlay network

docker network create --driver overlay

# Listing overlay networks

docker network ls --filter driver=overlay

# Creating a secret for a service

echo "" | docker secret create -

# Deploying a service with a secret

docker service create --name --secret

# Creating a config for a service

docker config create

# Deploying a service with a config

docker
